snippet: Bank of America Merrill Lynch named new co-heads of its technology, media and telecommunications investment banking group on Wednesday. It poached one from JPMorgan Chase.
abstract: Bank of America Merrill Lynch named new co-heads of its technology, media and telecommunications investment banking group on Wednesday. It poached one from JPMorgan Chase.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Bank of America Names New Co-Heads of Technology and Media Banking
